channel.title: math.CA updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CA updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Sharp weak bounds for the Hardy-Littlewood-P\'{o}lya operator and the weak bounds for the multilinear integral operator
item.description: arXiv:2505.17707v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper, we first obtain the operator norms of the $n$-dimensional Hardy-Littlewood-P\'{o}lya operator $\mathcal{H}$ from weighted Lebesgue spaces $L^p( \mathbb{R} ^n,| x |^{\beta} ) $ to weighted weak Lebesgue spaces $L^{q,\infty}(\mathbb{R} ^n,|x|^{\gamma})$. Next, we obtain the weak bounds for the $m$-linear $n$-dimensional integral operator.
item.dc:creator: Tianyang He
